commands.name: az network vhub connection create
commands.summary: Create a virtual hub VNet connection.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub connection create --name
                                  --remote-vnet
                                  --resource-group
                                  --vhub-name
                                  [--address-prefixes]
                                  [--associated]
                                  [--associated-inbound-routemap]
                                  [--associated-outbound-routemap]
                                  [--internet-security {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--labels]
                                  [--next-hop]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--propagated]
                                  [--remote-vnet-transit {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--route-name]
                                  [--use-hub-vnet-gateways {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network vhub connection create -n MyConnection --vhub-name MyHub -g MyRG --remote-vnet MyVNet

az network vhub connection create -n MyConnection --vhub-name MyHub -g MyRG --remote-vnet MyVNet --associated-route-table /subscriptions/MySub/resourceGroups/MyRG/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualHubs/MyHub/hubRouteTables/RouteTable1 --propagated-route-tables /subscriptions/MySub/resourceGroups/MyRG/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualHubs/MyHub/hubRouteTables/RouteTable1 /subscriptions/MySub/resourceGroups/MyRG/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualHubs/MyHub/hubRouteTables/RouteTable2 --labels label1 label2 --route-name route1 --next-hop 70.0.0.2 --address-prefixes 10.80.0.0/16 10.90.0.0/16

commands.name: az network vhub connection delete
commands.summary: Delete a virtual hub VNet connection.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub connection delete [--ids]
                                  [--name]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--vhub-name]
                                  [--yes]
examples: az network vhub connection delete -n MyConnection --vhub-name MyHub -g MyRG

commands.name: az network vhub connection list
examples: az network vhub connection list --vhub-name MyHub -g MyRG

commands.name: az network vhub connection show
commands.summary: Get the details of a virtual hub VNet connection.
examples: az network vhub connection show -n MyConnection --vhub-name MyHub -g MyRG

commands.name: az network vhub connection update
commands.summary: Update settings of a virtual hub connection.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub connection update [--add]
                                  [--associated]
                                  [--associated-inbound-routemap]
                                  [--associated-outbound-routemap]
                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--labels]
                                  [--name]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--propagated]
                                  [--remove]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--set]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--vhub-name]
examples: az network vhub connection update -n MyConnection --vhub-name MyHub -g MyRG --labels Newlabel1 Newlabel2

commands.name: az network vhub connection wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
